flavorText: Abandon not your faith when others abandon you.

foreignData.name: Schmarotzender Günstling
foreignData.text: Während der Versorgungsphase des Beherrschers der verzauberten Kreatur fügt der Günstling dem Beherrscher 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Der Beherrscher kann 1 für jeden Schadenspunkt zahlen, den er verhindern will.

name: Errant Minion
originalText: During target creature's controller's upkeep, Errant Minion deals 2 damage to him or her. He or she may pay o1 for each 1 damage he or she wishes to prevent from Errant Minion.
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Errant Minion deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.
